DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study gadoteric acid non-coronary MR angiography .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Gadoteric Acid Non-Coronary Magnetic Resonance ( MR ) Angiography
DOC.criteria: Male female , least age legal maturity Strongly suspect noncoronary arterial disease , detect clinically Scheduled undergo xray angiography examination Female patient must use effective contraception surgically sterilize postmenopausal . Females childbearing potential must document negative urine pregnancy test . Contraindication magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) Any metallic medical device vascular territory patient undergo image examination Congenital morphologic vascular abnormality Known allergy gadolinium chelate Pregnant , breast feeding , plan become pregnant trial Received gadolinium complex within 2 day iron oxide nanoparticles within 7 day gadoteric acidenhanced magnetic resonance angiography ( MRA ) examination .
